description: With a gentle kiss, Mama Bear puts Little Bear to bed. “I love you” turns into a precious game between Mama Bear and Little Bear, as they come up with many “I love you more” ideas. Make this tender book part of your bedtime routine then create your own “I love you more” examples with your child! Published by MangoSense.
imageTags: cover cover new f f bf
